Package logic.controller.user

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
logic.controller.AbstractController<User>
logic.controller.user.UserController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller<User>
public class UserController extends AbstractController<User>
UserController class extending Controller class parametrized with User class.

    • getInstance

      the instance of UserController to ensure Singleton design pattern.

    • getDao

      protected UserMongoDao getDao()
      Description copied from class: AbstractController
      Get the DAO used by the specific controller in order to call its DAO methods. Should be the DAO which manage the entity managed by the controller.
      Specified by:
      getDao in class AbstractController<User>
      Returns:
      the DAO of the specific Controller (UserDao).

    • register

      public org.bson.types.ObjectId register(User user) throws InvalidUsernameException
      Try to register a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to register.
      Returns:
      The id of the registred user.
      Throws:
      InvalidUsernameException - if the username is already taken.

      public User findOneByUsername(String username) throws NotFoundException
      Find one user by its username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The user if found. Otherwise, throw a NotFoundException.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the user is not found.

    • isLogged

      public boolean isLogged()
      Check if there is a user logged in.
      Returns:
      true if there is a user logged in, false otherwise.

    • isAdmin

      public boolean isAdmin()
      Return true if the user logged user is admin.
      Returns:
      True if the user is an admin. Otherwise, false.

    • isManagerOfCellar

      public boolean isManagerOfCellar(org.bson.types.ObjectId cellarId)
      Return true if the user logged is manager of the cellar in parameter.
      Parameters:
      cellarId - The id of the cellar to check.
      Returns:

      Parameters:
      companyId - The id of the company to check.
      Returns:

      Throws:
      NoLoggedUser - if there is no user logged.

      public boolean deleteOne(String username) throws MustBeAnAdminException
      Delete a user by its username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the user has been deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      MustBeAnAdminException - if the user is not an admin.

      public User addFriend(String username) throws NotFoundException, NoLoggedUser
      Add a friend to the logged user.
      Parameters:
      username - of the friend to add.
      Returns:
      the friend requested.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the friend is not found.
      NoLoggedUser - if there is no user logged.

    • acceptFriend

      public void acceptFriend(String username) throws NoLoggedUser
      Accept a friend request.
      Parameters:
      username - of the friend to accept.
      Throws:
      NoLoggedUser - if there is no user logged.

    • removeFriend

      public boolean removeFriend(String username) throws NoLoggedUser
      Remove a friend from the logged user.
      Parameters:
      username - of the friend to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the friend has been removed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NoLoggedUser - if there is no user logged.

    • getFriendList

      public List<Friend> getFriendList(boolean onlyAcceptedFriend) throws NoLoggedUser
      Return the list of friends of the logged user.
      Parameters:
      onlyAcceptedFriend - True if you want only the accepted friends. False if you want all the friends.
      Returns:
      The list of friends of the logged user.
      Throws:
      NoLoggedUser - if there is no user logged.

    • getFriendRequestList
